column5: Oil and gas producer SandRidge Energy  on Thursday backed out from its plan to buy smaller rival Bonanza Creek Energy   giving in to pressure from activist investor Carl Icahn and other shareholders.

column4: Transgender woman sues Wal-Mart over alleged bias in North Carolina
column5: Wal-Mart Stores Inc  was sued on Wednesday by a transgender woman who said she was wrongfully fired after complaining about harassment at the Sam's Club warehouse store in North Carolina where she had worked for 11 years.
